summary: A robust full-stack Car Rental Management System designed to streamline vehicle leasing operations. Built with a Spring Boot backend and a dynamic React frontend, it delivers seamless user and fleet management capabilities.
description: This comprehensive Car Rental Management System offers a modern digital solution for vehicle rental businesses. At its core, the application features a powerful Spring Boot backend that handles complex business logic and data persistence via MySQL, ensuring data integrity and fast response times. The frontend, developed with React and Vite, provides a responsive and interactive user experience enhanced by TailwindCSS and Material UI. Key functionalities include intuitive dashboards for managing car inventories, detailed user profile administration, and a streamlined loan processing workflow. The system is designed with scalability in mind, utilizing RESTful APIs to facilitate secure and efficient communication between client and server.

features.Fleet Management: Complete CRUD operations for managing vehicle inventory, including specifications and availability status.
features.User Administration: Secure user authentication and profile management for both administrators and customers.
features.Loan Processing: Streamlined workflow for processing vehicle loans, tracking rentals, and managing returns.
features.Modern UI/UX: Responsive interface built with React, styled with TailwindCSS and MUI, and enhanced with GSAP animations.
features.Data Persistence: Robust MySQL database integration using Hibernate ORM for reliable data storage and retrieval.
features.RESTful Architecture: Scalable API design ensuring efficient data exchange between the client and server.
